headline: A Look At Albemarle (ALB) Valuation As Lithium Sentiment Improves After Analyst Upgrades
summary: Recent analyst upgrades and a recovering lithium market have put Albemarle (ALB) back in focus for investors, after the company reported losses tied to earlier lithium price declines and moved to cut costs and sell noncore assets. See our latest analysis for Albemarle. The recent decision to idle the Kemerton lithium hydroxide plant, together with impairment charges and fresh 2026 guidance, comes against a backdrop where Albemarle's 90 day share price return of 45.34% contrasts with its 3...
